'''13w10a''' is the fourteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.5]], released on March 4, 2013.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/03/minecraft-snapshot-13w10a/</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Detector rail]]s'''
* Added texture for activated rails.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''Command block'''
* Pressing {{Keys|Esc}} in a command block exits its GUI.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Slime]]s'''
* Spawn rates in swamps now depend on the current [[moon]] phase.
